intro:
Get ready for a delicious pancake-making challenge!
Make tons of pancakes and watch your food cart prosper!
description:
Let's make pancakes on the Nintendo Switch™!
Cook pancakes without burning them, then add fruits and sauces on top!
Share Joy-Con™, and up to 4 players can join in!
Reach for the ultimate high score!

《Rules》
Make pancakes to order!
Stack them up high, then add scrumptious toppings!
Keep cooking until time runs out!

《How to Play》
1. Spread the batter on the pan and start cooking!

2. Once one side is cooked, flip it over!

3. Flip fully cooked pancakes onto a plate and start adding toppings!

4. Add fruit on top! Choose from strawberries, nuts, bananas, blueberries, kiwi, and mango!

5. Drizzle on a sauce! Choose from chocolate sauce, cream, and honey!

6. Once the pancakes are done, it's time to serve! The closer they match the order, the more points you get!

[Score Attack]
Cook up as many pancakes as possible and aim for the top spot on the leaderboards!

[Battle]
Compete with others and test your pancake-making skills!
